alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Jackson Hole; Rock Springs and Green River; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; South Lincoln County; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:35PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Locally Strong Winds and Brief Heavy Rain This Evening... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...Localized wind gusts between 45 and 60 mph possible from showers and thunderstorms. Localized heavy rainfall is possible with showers and thunderstorms. * WHERE...Fremont, Lincoln, Natrona, Sublette and Sweetwater counties. * WHEN...Through 1145 PM. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The very dry air mass at the surface could cause dry microbursts from showers and thunderstorms. The slow moving nature of showers and storms in combination with good moisture above the surface could lead to locally heavy rain and some minor flooding.
